typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Customer
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		Status as integer,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesHeader
Customer, SalesHeader join(Customer@CustomerID == SalesHeader@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CustomerVsSalesOrder
CustomerVsSalesOrder aggregate(groupBy(Customer@CustomerID),
	NumberOfOrders = count(SalesOrderID),
		TotalOrderAmount = sum(TotalDue)) ~> AggCustomerOrders
AggCustomerOrders sink(input(
		CustomerId as integer,
		NumberOfOrders as integer,
		TotalAmount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerId = CustomerID,
		NumberOfOrders,
		TotalAmount = TotalOrderAmount
	)) ~> TargetSqlServer

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlDimCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlSrcCustomer
AzureSqlSrcCustomer derive(HashKey = sha1(FirstName+LastName+CompanyName)) ~> HashKey
HashKey, AzureSqlDimCustomer exists(HashKey@HashKey == AzureSqlDimCustomer@HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> RecordExists
RecordExists, AzureSqlDimCustomer lookup(AzureSqlSrcCustomer@CustomerID == AzureSqlDimCustomer@CustomerID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LkpCustomer
LkpCustomer derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate),currentTimestamp(),{InsertedDate}),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> CreateAuditColumns
CreateAuditColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> Upsert
Upsert sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@CustomerID,
		NameStyle = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@NameStyle,
		Title = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@Title,
		FirstName = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@FirstName,
		MiddleName = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@MiddleName,
		LastName = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@LastName,
		Suffix = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@Suffix,
		CompanyName = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@CompanyName,
		SalesPerson = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@SalesPerson,
		EmailAddress = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@EmailAddress,
		Phone = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@Phone,
		PasswordHash = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@PasswordHash,
		PasswordSalt = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@PasswordSalt,
		rowguid = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@rowguid,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = HashKey@HashKey
	)) ~> AzureSqlTgtTable
